Title: Wanted: Torrential Lily
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Torrential Lily for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Expedition members have reported seeing a powerful Primalist in Gelikyr Overlook of Thaldraszus with a magical flower pinned to her collar. It is unknown if that is the legendary Torrential Lily, but it is a good place to start your search.
PortraitGiverText: A powerful water primalist in Thaldraszus wears the Torrential Lily pinned to her hood.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
CompletionText: Do you have something for the archives?
RewardText:
Just what we needed, another flower that leaks some weird liquid...

<Cataloger Jakes rolls her eyes.>

I'll ensure this is properly documented, researched, and archived for the expedition.
